Item.name: Oxy-Gen. Backpack
Item.description: A portable rebreathing station converted into a backpack allowing the user to breath underwater as well as refilling any oxygen tanks.

Item.name: Flare Gun
Item.description: An emergency flare gun intended for signaling ships. Fires flare shells to provide illumination.

Item.name: Flare Cartridge
Item.aliases: flare_cartridge, flare shot, flare_shot, flare round, flare_round
Item.description: Waterproof signal flare that illuminates a large area. Fired from a flare gun.
